name: Satisnet Technologies
overview:
Satisnet is recognized as the leader in PHP technologies, Yahoo Store Development and now Mobile application services since its advent. We are one of the pioneering companies with our head office in Ahmedabad, Gujarat which is considered as the 5th largest ITES cities in INDIA. Satisnet offers Open Management, Flexible, Employee friendly, Multi-cultural and State-of-the art infrastructure capacious to house 100 workstations spread across 5,000 sqft. office space.

We bring following experience, 50,000+ hours in Oscommerce, Xcart, Drupal. Wordpress, Joomla plug-in developments, modifications, enhancements and corePHP programming. 10,000+ hours in complex frameworks like YII, Symfony, Coldfusion, Zend and ROR 20,000+ hours in end-to-end YAHOO Store development 8,000+ hours in Graphic Designing of Web and Mobile 4,000+ hours in Iphone, Ipad, Itouch Operating System versions 3 till 6 and ANDROID. 4000+ hours in SEM

We render services to Individual business owners (IBOs), New Business Starters, Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) and Large Enterprises in private, public and government bodies from BFSI, Healthcare, Medical, Real Estate, Taxation, Auto, Fashion and Apparel, Jewelry, Manufacturing houses, Travel, Tourism, Hospitality, Printing, Computing, Information Technology and Mobile industry

At the outset, we can meet your needs with minimum investment from our certified resources in best time frame without compromising on Quality Standards in the following verticals: YAHOO store development Web Programming services in PHP and DOTNET Online Shop or E-commerce development, enhancement, modification and integration Mobile Application Development in IOS version 4 till 6, ANDROID SEO services includes On-Page, Smart Off-Page optimization work Social Media Networking and Rich Media Network Applications

Our Technical Expertise includes extensive knowledge and expertise in PHP 4/5 SQL, PL/SQL, JavaScript, Action Script 2/3, XHTM, CSS, Win CE, Windows Phone 7, Eclipse, Zend Studio Flash, Flex Builder, Silver light, VMWare, Virtual Box, Facebook SDK (API, FBML, FQL, FBJS, Facebook Connect), Twitter API, Flickr API, Google Maps API, Smarty, AJAX, LAMP, DHTML, MOSS, MS BizTalk, Exchange Server.

Client Corner

“Excellent customer service with on time delivery”, says Mr. Hammond

“This was my first time successfully outsourcing a project. I have tried in the past but did not have success. Jugal and his team at Satisnet went out of there way to make sure the site was a success. As in any project issues come up and they did, but Jugal made sure they were taken care of” says Mr.C.Flores.

“I have worked with this provider on many projects and they are always excellent! They did an amazing job programming my yahoo store, and I have had many compliments from other yahoo store programmers on how good of a job they did! I am very satisfied with the quality of work and the great price that they gave me for this project” says Mr. M. Lockwood.

“I found Satisnet and Jugal to be very affordable and very professional. It’s very hard these days to find someone who will do a good job for a good price…” says Mr. M. Reichmann
